title: Toll
text: Hier muss man gewesen sein. So tolle Informationen und Sehenswürdigkeiten ist selten. Unglaublich interessant und bildend.

title: Excelente museo
text: Excelente museo. Organizado y pensado para niños y adultos. Sin duda repetiria. No nos dió tiempo a verlo por completo.

title: مجموعة ضخمة من المعدات القديمة
text: مقارنة بالمتاحف الفنية ، لا يمكن اعتبار مجموعة المتحف الألماني مثيرة للإعجاب. يتم تخزين حوالي 50 ألف كائن في جدرانه ، ويذهب الحساب إلى مئات الآلاف ، في متحف اللوفر ، على سبيل المثال ، أكثر من مليون لوحة. سبب اهتمام الجمهور بالمتحف الألماني هو موضوع وتفرد العديد من المعروضات. كمصور ، كان من المثير جدًا بالنسبة لي متابعة تطور معدات الكاميرا. يبدو أن جميع الأجهزة التي يمكن تصورها والتي تم إنشاؤها في القرنين التاسع عشر والعشرين تم جمعها في القاعة. تخللتها أدراج ضخمة على حوامل ثلاثية مع صناديق خشبية مع مقابض. وقد استكملت من قبل تفشي القديمة مثل بريموس وكيروجاز. الآن لا أحد يفكر في الجهود التي تبذلها عملية تطوير الفيلم وطباعة الصور الفوتوغرافية ، لكن أحواض الاستحمام والمكبرات وجرور الحلول تم تذكيرها على الفور بتلك الأوقات التي كان يتعين فيها تصوير كل صورة لفترة طويلة قبل الحصول على صورة.

title: Really nice museum about the history of technology
text: My favourite area was the mines but sadly they didn't have an English translation of the explanations in this part (maybe with the app?). Also the part about boats was cool, they have so many models and also a few real-size ones and a U-boat.Advice for visitors: buy the tickets online to skip the queue. And also don't go too late, it closes at 17 and you'll spend at least 2 or 3 hours there.

title: History of Germany
text: It takes about 3-4 hours, if you use the headphone guides.  I liked the history area of the 1900's, that dealt with world war I and 2

title: One of the most amazing places
text: One of the most amazing scientific museums in the world. That catalogues the scientific history of the world
visitor_origin: Emirate of Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Logistically a nightmare
text: You pay for triple ticket to see the museum, treasury, and the theater. There is no sense to how the touring happens. Rude staff yell at you to go to the next room and then you have to turn around and walk back through- there is no flow. Staff aren’t helpful or friendly. I would skip this all together
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Very interesting museum with a lot of exhibits
text: There is definitely a lot to see here for those interested in science and history. Unfortunately not a lot of descriptions in English, other than the flight section - which was excellent. Apparently their English audio guide is an app, but for those without cell phones, this is not an option. We were surprised they didn't offer audio guides in different languages at the entrance - most of the museums we visited while in Germany did. I was particularly disappointed that there were no English translations in the mining section. But other than that, it was a fascinating museum with many interesting exhibits. You could spend the whole day here and not cover it all.

title: Un po’ delusa
text: Museo della scienza e della tecnica. Peccato che non vi sia audioguida, manchino quasi del tutto spiegazioni in inglese. Interessante ( ma forse un po’ claustrofobia) la ricostruzione della miniera. Le dimostrazioni delle macchine sono tutte in tedesco.

title: Excellent Tech - Sadly some exhibits closed.
text: I last visited in 2008 and was thrilled with the rocketry exhibits. I made a special trip from Poland to revisit it this Sept. and was eagerly looking forward to the V2 section of the Museum. After visiting the entire museum I had to ask and was told that they hoped it would reopen in 2021. Darn.My engineering expertise is embedded microelectronic systems. They are planning a new section to open in 2020 but at least teased us with a wonderful collection of computers ranging from the abacus to an excellent cross-section of mainframes and early super computers. I will plan to revisit in 3-5 years.It was quite noticeable which sections still needed renovation. All newer exhibits included both the German and English text (Thank You!!!) and were sometimes difficult to read but still more enjoyable than the ,Deutsch Only, section even though I can read both.I am still impressed with the depth and breadth of the detail they put into the Mining section and would believe that younger children might find that interesting even if they don't understand the ramifications.The early flight section was well done and hopefully will tie in with the modern space exploration section when it reopens. I waited 11 years to return and as a MIT trained engineer still appreciated much of what I saw and learned.

title: A must do in Munich if you have any interest in science and technology.
text: This was like several Smithsonian museums rolled into one.  Way too much to see in one day, but I crammed as much as possible.There is some signage in English, but a little knowledge of German goes a long way.  Regardless, there are so many things to do.  Don't miss the U-1 (actual first German U-Boat intact and cut-away), the high voltage show, and the mines exhibit.

title: Perfect to learn about İndustry and History of Munich
text: We visit there with our 8-12 year old kids. It was very enjoyable and informative visit. There are many machine and things that from 19th of Germany. The kids liked it too much. Also the view is wonderfull on the roof of the museum. You should climb the stairs or elevator to reach. But it was amazing view of Munich from the roof. Also there are many interesting toys and thing to buy in museum store.

title: Da visitare
text: Se amate la meccanica e l' informatica è assolutamente da visitare, c'è un ampia area con l'evoluzione della scienza nei vari campi, matematici, meccanici ecc i piani interrati hanno una riproduzione di una miniera e dell'evoluzione delle varie tecniche di estrazione dei minerali, scienze naturali e all' ultimo piano astronomia e un planetario. C'è un ristorante self service, l'unica pecca è che la maggior parte dei cartelli che dovrebbero spiegare quello a cui ci si trova davanti sono in lingua tedesca.

title: Enorme
text: Monaco ha tante attrazioni, non si può vedere tutto se uno non ha tanti giorni a disposizione, ma questo museo merita sicuramente di non essere trascurato durante il soggiorno in terra bavarese. Affascinante la grossa esposizione dedicata alle miniere a grandezza naturale, per non parlare poi della zona dedicata alla fisica con le varie strumentazioni alle quali il visitatore può accedere personalmente e verificarne il funzionamento. La stanza dell'elettricità simulata con un fulmine che colpisce una gabbia è fenomenale. Unica pecca è rappresentata dal fatto che le indicazioni tra un salone e l'altro sono confusionarie; non è facile, si perde tempo a cercare e, se ci si trova in periodi affollati, anche gli ascensori diventano un incubo.

title: You really need more than one day in here!
text: Since a kid, I have been going to this museum whenever I find the time. And every time, there is something new to see and learn about. And with the online ticket service, you can avoid the long lines at the front.

title: Fotomuseum
text: Auf der website werben sie mit fotomuseum..leider gibts das nicht mehr.4 etagen unterschiedliche austellungenIst interessant.Dem personal..die leute nicht so anstarren..das ist unangenehm fuer den besucher..Wir wollen die austellungen ansehen und nicht klauen.Laesst dich verweilen.

title: Tanta roba...nel bene e nel male
text: Il museo offre tantissimo materiale. Penso che per  la città, le scolaresche locali e che per chi voglia approfondire le proprie conoscenze, sia una risorsa incredibile. Al tempo stesso non è tutto oro quello che luccica, soprattutto se si organizza, come nel mio caso, una gita con i figli senza avere un obiettivo specifico. Il museo infatti è sicuramente ricco di materiale ma alterna allestimenti moderni e coinvolgenti ad allestimenti che mostrano il segno del tempo. Tra le particolarità del museo, è sicuramente degna di nota l'ampia zona dedicata alle miniere. Una ricostruzione fin troppo estesa di una miniera che con la calca del week end è assolutamente sconsigliata a chi soffre di claustrofobia. Le zone dedicate alla matematica e la fisica offrono la possibilità di fare un sacco di esperimenti interessanti. Insomma una visita da fare se si passa da Monaco, con la consapevolezza che richiede almeno mezza giornata e che non tutte le aree sono "lo stato dell'arte" rispetto ai più recenti musei della scienza e della tecnica. Secondo me infatti il "piccolo" MUSE di Trento, per esempio, può offrire per i non tecnici, delle esperienze anche più interessanti di questo sconfinato museo di Monaco.

title: Fantastic break from Art for the science minded!
text: New and old technologies of varying topics spread over about 6 floors. Museum staff very friendly and nearly all exhibits kid friendly while informative and impressive to adults as well.

title: Un gran museo
text: El museo ofrece grandes salas dedicadas a la navegación (barcos de todas las épocas), aeronáutica, informática, etc.Es una buena opción para ir con niños pero en mi opinión no es visita obligada salvo que pases muchos días en Múnich o te interese alguna de las temáticas de las salas.

title: Sehr interessant teilweise
text: Ja das Museum ist in die Jahre gekommen, aber es wird renoviert und saniert und dass man dann Einschränkungen in dieser Zeit in Kauf nehmen muss, ist für mich völlig normal. Es wird wenigstens was getan. Jeder hat so seine Interessen und was der eine spannend findet, interessiert den anderen nicht. So ist das nun mal in einem Museum, welches so viele Bereiche abdeckt. Das Restaurant könnte besser organisiert sein. Und do zwischendurch Ruheecken fände ich auch ganz schön. Aber man kann nicht allen Menschen gerecht werden. Da wir in der Nähe des Ruhrgebiets wohnen und sowohl Zeche Zollverein als auch den Landschaftspark in Duisburg schon besucht haben, ist das Bergwerk etc für uns nicht sooo interessant und gelungen aber für jemanden, der do etwas gar nicht kennt ist es gut gemacht. Was ich nur nicht verstehe, warum eine Riesen Photografie eines Hochofens aus Amerika dort hängt, wo wir in Deutschland die größten Hochöfen stehen haben. Alles in allem waren es interessante und unterhaltsame Stunden bei regnerischem Wetter.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Technik pur
text: Tolles riesiges und umfangreiches Museum. Beeindruckende Gegenstände oder Nachbauten aus vielen Jahrhunderten. Absolutes Muss wenn einmal in München ist, allerdings sollte man sich Zeit nehmen.

title: ביקור חובה לכל ילד סקרן
text: המוזיאון מקסים, מלא עניין. למוזיאון מספר קומות, בכל קומה עולם שלם, כולל בין השאר את: עולם הילדים, פלנטריום, תעופה וחלל, טכנולוגיית הדפוס, מחשבים, כלי נגינה, אסטרונומיה, מעבדת DNA, טכנולוגיות אנרגיה וקומה תת קרקעית שלמה של מנהרות ומערות המספרים את היסטוריית הכרייה בגרמניה. מומלץ מאוד למטיילים במינכן, או כנקודת פתיחה או סיום לטיול באוסטריה. העברנו שם חצי יום בכיף. מומלץ לקנות כרטיס ONLINE כדי לא לעמוד בתור.

title: Many attractions missing
text: I was looking forward to returning to the Deutsches Museum after 5 years. I was especially looking forward to seeing the cameras, Old technology and the V2 rocket. Incredibly none of these major attractions were available and were closed. I was bitterly disappointed that many amazing things I loved seeing last time are no longer available to see.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Einfach nur noch peinlich - dafür habe ich kein Verständnis
text: Ich war an einem regnerischen Sonntagvormittag hier. Der Ansturm um 9.30 Uhr hielt sich noch in Grenzen.Allerdings war ich schon im Außenbereich - nun, nennen wir es - überrascht. Die Kasse in einem Container und Beworben wird eine Tiefsee-Ausstellung aus 2012?!Im Inneren die nächste Ernüchterung - der Kontrolleur am Einlass war mit meiner im Internet gekauften Eintrittskarte überfordert. Und damit zeichnete sich schon ab, was mich dann wohl erwarten würde - Überforderung und Dilettantismus.Während die Schiffe-Abteilung direkt nach dem Eingang war wie gewohnt, war ich schon von der Elektrotechnik-Vorführung ernüchtert. Man schafft es leider nicht, dem Ansturm gerecht zu werden. Sonntagvormittags um 11 war die Vorführung so voll, dass man schlichtweg nichts sehen konnte - mit Kindern gar nicht vorstellbar. Nebenbei bemerkt: die Absperrungen um einige Exponate waren so wackelig, dass man sich nicht mal traute sich dagegen zu lehnen ...Weiter im Haus: Wo ist die Chemie geblieben? Und was soll das für ein Mist bei der Pharmazie sei? Eine Aneinanderreihung von quietsch-farbigen Schautafeln, merkwürdigen Schwerpunkten, nichts, was mit Produktion oder Analytik zu tun hat. Aber man weiß jetzt wenigsten, dass der vorhandenen Farbdrucker funktioniert ...Die Physik: Bewährt, mit sehr verständlichen Experimente, wenn sie denn funktionieren. Mitarbeiter verwenden viel Zeit darauf, die Schaukästen abzustauben, auch dann wenn das Experiment darin gar nicht mehr funktioniert, weil der Zahn der Zeit und die Besucher wohl sehr daran genagt haben ...EDV - echt jetzt (ich wollte mir den Spruch verkneifen, aber mir fällt nichts anderes ein): Eine Anregung von riesigen alten Schalt- und Relais-Schränken. OK, einmal aber nicht 10 mal hintereinander; und das alles scheint vor 15 Jahren stehen geblieben zu sein.Die Sonderausstellung Kaffee - nett (ja, und ich meine das als kleine Schwester von ...) Ein opulenter Sonderbau, über einen extra gebauten Frei-Weg erreichbar - hier hatte wohl das ansonsten bestehende bauliche "Innenhof-Problem" (siehe unten) keinen Einfluß?! Im Plan leider dem falschen Stockwerk zugeordnet und nur durch Zufall gefunden. Hier finden sich ganz schöne Exponate, aber wieder viel mehr farbige Schautafeln. Und die Fühlung, äh, was äh, soll äh, ich äh, schreiben? Lesen sie sich doch einfach alles durch, das würde sonst den Rahmen der Führung äh, sprengen.Sorry Leute. Der Fund der Weltkriegsbomben im Innenhof wird thematisiert, auch die Schwierigkeit des Abtransports. Ich habe auch für viel Verständnis. Aber dass man ein Museum dann so runterwirtschaftet? Die geschlossenen Ableitungen im Hauptgebäude haben mit dem Innenhof nichts zu tun. Und dass gefühlt fast alle Führungen und Aktivitäten an einem Sonntag - angeblich wegen Personalmangels - ausfallen müssen, wohl auch nicht.Das, was da aktuell in München als Deutsches Museum rumsteht ist weder der historischen Bedeutung der Einrichtung, der Stadt noch dem Preis und dem Service, der dafür geboten wird, würdig.

title: Lidt for støvet og lidt for gammelt
text: Store sale og lidt for slidt. Elevatorerne er med få undtagelser af typen, hvor men må vente i lang tid, før de kommer frem.

title: big museum
text: When we went a part of the museum was closed because of the renovation, but there was still soooo much to see . Big variety of topics and all with interactive options. So much fun. Good signage to find your favourite. When i was little i loved going down to the mine, now it is a bit old, needs updating but still worth a visit.

title: Great Museum
text: Took me over 3 hours to complete. Great museum. Some of the interactive activities are great and there were all ages using them

title: Museo impressionante
text: Questo museo della tecnica passata, presente e futura non si può non visitare. I suoi 6 piani, suddivisi per argomento, fanno vivere al visitatore delle esperienze magnifiche. dal 6° piano si può vedere Monaco dall'alto. Imperdibile lo "spettacolo" dell'elettricità simulata al primo piano. Unica pecca, tutte le spiegazioni sono in tedesco ed inglese, quindi chi mastica poco le due lingue può apprezzare meno le opere esposte.

title: Nice place to get more knowledge about how the german industry developed
text: The best technical museum ever visited. In avery simple manner you get a lot of knowledge how the industrial power ot Gemany was created.

title: Para que asar varios dias
text: La verdad es que me para pasar una mañana como estuvimos nosotros te da tiempo a ver o justito, necesitarías 2-3 días para verlo más o menos bien.La zona de los barcos es espectacular.... otras zonas también.Muy recomendable!!!!

title: A day in a museum
text: You must see this museum it is literally amazing. You can also see the all city from the roof of this museum.

title: Don’t Bother visiting Here!!
text: We were looking forward to visiting with a 14 year old and a 9 year old, but this turned out to be the most boring museum we have ever visited. It was outdated and underwhelming. The exhibits looked like they were designed in the 1970s and there was no attempt to make them interesting. There were no interactive exhibits to speak of and the so-called ‘flight simulator’ did not ‘simulate’!!! I would recommend a visit to the zoo instead.

title: 周りきれない
text: 広くてじっくり見て回ると回り切れないほどの広さがある。個人的には、地下の船舶、深海に関するフロアがおすすめ。Uボートの展示等もある。どちらかといえば体験型の博物館。トイレのドアが開きにくいため注意。

title: Merita una visita
text: Ero tentato di non andare dopo aver letto le recensioni ed invece posso.dire.che il museo.merita una visita. Lo stile e un po datato ma anche questo lo rende affascinante. I cartelli informativi sono in tedesco ed in inglese ma credo che nel.2019 non ci sia più nessuno che ha ancora bisogno della spiegazioncina in italiano... merita una visita.

title: Bella mattinata!
text: Penso che il Deutsches Museum di Monaco sia il museo scientifico più bello e ricco che abbia mai visitato. Vi sono ben 7 piani, tutti degni di essere accuratamente esplorati! Consiglio assolutamente a chiunque di passarvici una mattinata o un pomeriggio!

title: Excelent museum
text: Well worth a visit for adults & kids alike.Good viewing floor at the top (We started on the top floor & worked down).I loved the old toys section & the music room.So much to see.Great shop.Could spend whol day here.

title: interessante
text: Sei piani di museo,  tutti interessanti peccato che in alcuni le indicazioni sono scritte in inglese e in tedesco, in altri, i più recenti , solo in tedesco. Non capisco perché non possano fornire un'audio-guida almeno per i riferimenti principali.  Peccato...una grave mancanza considerato la mole di visite non solo di tedeschi.

title: Best museum ever
text: We had a lot of fun visiting with our 3 year old. The exhibition space is massive and you could easily spend 5 hours in here.There was a super long waiting line to get the tickets (more than 1hour), so plan accordingly if you want to visit on a rainy Saturday morning.

title: Museumsbesuch
text: Die Ausstellungen sind hoch interessant und einen Besuch wert.Die Präsentation und das Haus als ganzes ist jedoch sehr in die Jahre gekommen.

title: Fantastico
text: Un museo stupendo. Tanti settori e tante cose belle e interessanti da vedere. Conviene prevedere almeno una giornata intera per poterlo visionare.

title: Not as good as expected
text: Lots of expos, but many of them are not in working order or were not accessible to visitors when I was there (e.g. plane simulator, VR lab). Place is huge with confusing signs and rather bad air conditioning. I was told I couldn't pay the entrance fee with plastic money, but cash only. After insisting on paying with a debit card (I saw a POS terminal on the counter) or I will leave, the cashier agreed me to do so. Was expecting much more, especially for such a high entrance fee.

title: Grande ma antiquato
text: Museo completo ma molto datato sia nella struttura che nell'esposizione.Mancano audio guide e/o spiegazioni semplici (talvolta solo in tedesco).L'interattività degli esperimenti per i bambini è bassa.Andate al museo delle scienze di Parigi e capirete!Sconsiglio la visita.

title: Ωραιο αλλα
text: Το μουσείο είναι εντυπωσιακό. Με εξαιρετικά εκθέματα που κρατούν το ενδιαφέρον σε μικρούς και μεγάλους. Το μεγαλύτερο αρνητικό είναι ότι πολλοί δεν μιλούν αγγλικά το θέμα αυτό είναι αρκετά μεγάλο πρόβλημα.

title: Scarso
text: Scarso. Solo 2 lingue.Materiale cartaceo.No audiovisiviNo smart techMi sono ritrovato negli anni 70.

title: Super museo
text: Assolutamente una tappa obbligatoria se si sta visitando Monaco.Il prezzo del biglietto è di 14 euro.Il museo è diviso in varie categorie, per esempio: astronomia, navigazione marittima, energia elettrica, fisica e tante altre. È composto in totale da 6 piani nei quali sono distribuite le varie sezioni, molto ben segnalate dai cartelli. È comunque possibile prendere una guida cartacea all'ingresso, disponibile anche in lingua inglese, nella quale sono descritte tutte le categorie e dove sono allocate.Non mi è piaciuta l'assenza della lingua inglese in molte descrizioni dei pezzi in esposizione, che presentano la didascalia solo in tedesco e il fatto che non è possibile visitare il planetario con il biglietto standard e non è segnalato in nessun cartello. Se trascuriamo inoltre, l'obsolescenza di alcune esposizioni, alle quali si potrebbe dare una rinfrescata, ho trovato tutto molto bello e interessante

title: Great for Science, Industry, Technology, but hot inside and hard to navigate from one exhibit to another, lots of stairs
text: Go early to avoid the afternoon long lines, it takes hours to see it all and you will probably miss exhibits if you are not following the map they provide. 14 Euros per person or 29 Euros for a family which includes all children up to age 17. Great for a rainy day, with no A/C it gets hot inside even on days when the weather outside is cool.There are lots of stairs and it is difficult to get onto the elevators because they fill up fast and they are small. There is a restaurant there.Level -1 exhibits are Mine, Marine Navigation, Oceanography, Environment, Nano and Biotechnology. Level 0 exhibits are Foundry, Electric Power, Machine Tools, Metals, Mine, Power Machinery, Marine Navigation, Kids Kingdom Play area, DNA visitors lab, Microscopy Theater, and New Technologies.Level 1 exhibits are Academy Collection, Physics, Aviation, Energy Technology, Pharma, Coffee, VR lab, Hall of Fame and Tinkering/Hands on area.Level 2 is Glass, Ceramic, Music, Technical Toys, Cave, Flight Simulator, and Lab.Level 3 exhibits are Astronomy, Measures, Weights, Observatory, Computers, Mathematical, Micro electronics, Chronometry, Geodes, Weather.Levels 4-6 exhibits are Astronomy, Cosmology, Observation, Planetarium, Sundial and Radio.There is a guy making colorful glass things and you can purchase them there.You really need a map to see all of the exhibits. So many times we came to the end of a floor but after glancing at the map we could see that there was another exhibit we couldn't see unless we walked to a certain spot and then a doorway was visible. Even though the temperature outside was in the low 70's it was hot on the upper floors of the building. The trash in the ladies restroom was overflowing by noon. We visited once in the afternoon and the line was soooo long, after waiting for a half of an hour we left. We return the next morning at 9 am and had a great experience.

title: Un museo che ti insegna tanto
text: Il museo della scienza di Monaco è ben strutturato, su 6 piani che toccano diversi campi applicativi. E' un museo per tutti, grandi e piccini, per i quali è molto interattivo. Le descrizioni di ciò che è presente al suo interno sono in tedesco ed inglese. Ne consiglio vivamente la visita. Il costo del biglietto di ingresso è di 14€ per gli adulti. Le diverse esposizioni sono ben documentate e spiegate nel dettaglio, particolarmente apprezzata è stata la visita di una miniera ( riprodotta al piano -1), che non consiglierei a chi soffre di claustrofobia.

title: Nice place
text: The museum is so huge you need approximately 2to 3hrs to cover the place. My kids loved the technical toys section.

title: Museo incredibilmente bello
text: Il Deutsches Museum è un museo veramente interessante con i suoi 6 piani ricchi di reperti interessanti... il piano terra offre un'incredibile varietà di modelli di barche a vela antiche e moderne... si parte dalle primordiali canoe fino ad arrivare alle più moderne creazioni umane... non è il solito museo ricco di reperti antichi e basta ....si ripercorre in esso la storia della tecnologia... in ogni piano vi sono diversi settori... interessantissimo il settore astronomico... Per non parlare poi della terrazza al sesto piano dalla quale è possibile scattare delle foto uniche di tutta Monaco... vista la lunghissima coda trovata a mezzogiorno, consiglio caldamente di andare all'apertura. Assolutamente da visitare

title: Spenderar lätt en hel dag här
text: Här finns det att göra för alla åldrar en regnig dag eller en solig . Hur mycket som helst att titta på.  Ett tips- ha bra skor då man lär gå många steg och ta hjälp av informationskartan och sortera, du hinner inte allt på en dag..

title: Interessante ma male organizzato
text: Il museo è bellissimo, enorme, spazia tra gli argomenti più vari. Vale sicuramente la pena andarci, soprattutto in un giorno di pioggia, frequente a Monaco.Tuttavia bisogna dire che l’organizzazione generale dell struttura lascia molto a desiderare. Innanzi tutto il giorno della nostra visita pioveva e la fila per l’acquisto dei ticket (davvero lunghissima, girava tutt’intorno al museo) si articolava per lo più sotto l’acqua battente e con i bambini piccoli non è certo una bella cosa. Stesso problema delle attese lunghissime si è ripresentato all’ingresso per il controllo biglietti, molta gente non riusciva ad entrare e quindi era ancora in attesa sotto l’acqua. File anche al guardaroba per lasciare gli indumenti e gli zaini bagnati, ai bagni (davvero pochissimi) e poi al ristorante all’ora di pranzo... insomma una cosa davvero sfinente per che ha bimbi piccoli.Infine quasi tutte le didascalie sono esclusivamente in tedesco e quindi a tutti gli altri è preclusa la comprensione.Il planetario ha possibilità di accesso solo a tre orari, dopodiché chiude. Questa informazione non è menzionata da alcuna parte se non davanti l’accesso del planetario stesso che viene preso d’assalto e quindi è precluso e tutti gli altri.Comunque gli spazi sono tantissimi e girando bene dopo un po’ ci si riesce ad allontanare dal folla e dal casino.Il kinder kingdom é una bella idea, ma davvero troppo confusionario.Insomma c’è da migliorare

title: Il migliore
text: Museo enorme, completo e super dettagliato... Abbraccia innumerevoli campi dai minerali all'astrologia con eventi live molto interessanti. Unica pecca è che questi eventi live sono solo ed unicamente in tedesco...Esperienza assolutamente da provare sopratutto se si è studenti grazie anche alla riduzione del prezzo da 14€ a 7€.

title: Wir waren gar nicht drin!
text: Zuerst: Ich erlaube mir keine Bewertung zum Inneren des Museums. Aber über die ungenügende Organisation in jedem Fall.Da wir mit zwei Kindern extra von weit her angereist sind, war die Vorfreude dementsprechend groß. An einem Samstag in den Schulferien rechnet man natürlich auch damit, dass es voll ist, doch etwas in dieser Dimension hatten wir nicht erwartet. Die Schlange vor der Kasse war so unglaublich lang, dass wir Menschen im vorderen Bereich fragten und diese warteten bereits seit über 2 Stunden. Der Kassenbereich war in einem Container untergebracht, wahrscheinlich wegen der momentanen Bauarbeiten. Ich habe KEINERLEI Verständnis dafür, wie ein Museum dieser Größe und mit dem Zulauf aus der ganzen Welt es nicht schafft, mehr Kassen zur Verfügung zu stellen. Eine absolute Zumutung war das und das Personal war zusätzlich auch noch unfreundlich. Danke für den Frust und die Tränen bei meinen Kindern. Nie wieder.

title: Много
text: Большой и очень добротный политехнический музей, в котором можно увидеть имитацию горных выработок, пройти по ним. Есть хорошая экспозиция по металлургии, стекольному делу. Подводная лодка 1-й мировой в разрезе и многое еще. Это именно музей, не развивающая площадка с активностями, поэтому некоторым может быть скучно. Но если подготовиться, то очень и очень. Многое можно увидеть только здесь. Семейный билет - 29 евро. Развлечение на день или как минимум полдня.

text: Ottimo museo da visitare con bambini al seguito che non si annoieranno di sicuro visto che in ogni sale c'e qualcosa per tenerli impegnati. Fila lunghissima per comprare i biglietti circa un'ora e mezza.

title: Le gustará a grandes y a chicos
text: Enorme museo de ciencias, el cual les llevará varias horas recorrerlo. Gustará a grandes y a chicos. Es para destacar que la comida que venden en los restaurant son de muy buena calidad y justifica almorzar ahí. Los precios, adecuados.

title: Definitely needs some refurbishment
text: To be frank, we were a bit disappointed by the museum. The museum definitely needs some refurbishment. As a Deutsch-naive visitor, it is really difficult to understand the content of the exhibition. English versions were provided, but quite a number of them faded off, especially those in 4/F and 5/F on the topic of Astronomy. Therefore it’s not readable. It’s quite interactive, tho we found the exhibition quite scattered. Having bits here and there. We had a feel that it’s not organised enough. The part that I like most was about Musical instrumentals where they put out a number of rare and antique items, ie. the Orchestrion.

title: Great place for a rainy day
text: Hadn't planned to visit but got caught out on a rainy day. Couldn't have found a better place to end up. Before we knew it we'd been there over 4 hours and they were closing - the time really flew. There's so much to see and loads of interactive exhibits. Lots of the exhibits had English descriptions as well as German but even if not there is a free app you can download which tells you everything you need to know.Thoroughly enjoyed our day here!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Impressive
text: I spent about 4 hours wandering around this museum. Very impressive in scale and excellent exhibits. Some areas don't have any English translations but for the most part there is. I would suggest arriving near opening to avoid a long queue for tickets or but the tickets online (not available say time of my visit due to technical problems). Recommended.

title: Ci aspettavamo di più
text: Il museo ci ha un po' deluso come organizzazione. Purtroppo in molte delle cose esposte le spiegazioni sono solo in tedesco. Molto bella la nuova sezione di nanotecnologia. Lunga fila all'ingresso, peccato non fosse possibile l'acquisto on line per problemi al sito,

title: Schön, groß, Fahrstühle mäh
text: Das Museum ist riesengroß, hat sehr viel zu bieten, alles soweit auch wunderbar. Wenn man aber mit einem Kindderwagen unterwegs ist, wird es tricky - Fahrstühle sind klein und unbequem, auf anderen Stockwerken außer dem Erdgeschoss wartet man ewig auf einen freien Fahrstuhl nach oben - mit drei bis vier Leuten ist dieser bereits zu voll. Die größeren Fahrstühle gehen nur bis zum dritten OG - unbequem!Das Planetarium lockte mit einer Vorstellung für EUR 3,50 extra, aber die Vorstellung war ein bisschen trocken, nicht sehr zugänglich, teilweise zu viel Fachjargon für einen Ottonormalbesucher. Die vergleichbare Vorstellung im Natural History Museum in New York ist sehr viel schöner und zugänglicher für Nicht-Astronomen.Personal könnte hier und da freundlicher sein. Vor allem nicht die Leute anmotzen, die verborgene kleingedruckte Information nicht direkt beim Betreten des Museums verinnerlicht haben (weil diese nicht sehr omnipräsent ist).

title: Dieses Museum gehört ins Museum!
text: Ich war, glaube ich, vor ca. 45 Jahren das erste Mal in diesem Museum, und dachte, meinen Töchtern und einem befreundeten Mädchen an einem verregneten Augusttag etwas Besonderes bieten zu können. Das klappte auch zu Beginn unerwarteterweise sehr gut, mussten wir doch, auch wegen des nicht funktionierenden Onlineticketing-Service, geschlagene 70 Minuten anstehen, um an einer der 2 (in Worten zwei!) Kassen - mehr sind offensichtlich nicht vorgesehen - unsere Eintrittskarten zu erstehen.In meiner Erinnerung hat sich seit meinem ersten Besuch nicht wirklich etwas verändert, außer daß modernere Entspannungsliegen angeschafft wurden... Die Vorführungen, die wir besuchten - Hochspannung, Flüssiger Stickstoff,   Mikroskopisches Theater - glänzten durch viel zu wenig Platz für interessierte Besucher. Die verschiedenen Themenbereiche gefallen durch eine weitreichende verstaubte Anmutung wahrscheinlich nur eingefleischten Nostalgikern, von modernen interaktiven, didaktisch und für junge Besucher pädagogisch sinnvollen “Experimenten” fehlt weit und breit jede Spur, sieht man von den zaghaften Versuchen im VR-Bereich und den sich daran anschließenden Räumen im Sektor “Neue Technologien” ab... aber bis wir dort waren, hatte sich bei meinen Zöglingen schon allgemeine Ermattung eingestellt. Auch hinsichtlich des Konzeptes zur zielgerichteten Besucherführung ließe sich einiges verbessern. Zugegeben, ein Museum dieser Größenordnung ist schwierig zu strukturieren und für den interessierten Besucher systematisch zu erschließen - zumal in einem Nachmittag, mehr blieb uns nach der anfänglichen Warterei an Zeit nicht übrig. Meines Erachtens ist es dringend erforderlich, in vielen Bereichen über eine zeitgemäße und moderne - im besten Fall innovative - Präsentation der Sammlung und der interaktiven Angebote nachzudenken. Andere Angebote im Alpenumfeld - ob klein oder groß - zeigen, wie das gelingen könnte. Diese haben z.T. allerdings den nicht von der Hand zu weisenden Vorteil, daß sie nicht auf so eine lange Geschichte zurückgreifen können.... Fluch und Segen!Das Museumsrestaurant hat konzeptionell und qualitativ den gleichen Überarbeitungebedarf!

title: Немецкий музей
text: Можно провести с удовольствием не спеша целый день. Берите с собой пенсионное или льготное по билетам будет скидка. Очень интересное место

title: A MUST in Munich
text: You find a lot of very very interesting stuff.I go there, whenever i’m in munich. And there is so much to see, that your first visit will just be an overview. If the weather is good to you - you can see the mountains from the roof. Don’t miss it - also the view over munich is great.

title: 박물관
text: 학생할인을 받았고, 딱 할인가격의 가치만큼 했던 것 같다. 규모가 매우 크다고 해서 반나절만에 볼 수 있을까 걱정했지만 슥슥 보다보니 생각보다 금방 보았다. 테마별로 나눠져 있어 관심 분야만 꼼꼼히 보는 것도 나쁘지 않을 것 같다.

title: Stort och intressant
text: Mycket intressant museum, men det var så otroligt stort att vi inte hann se ens 10 % av allt under de två timmar vi var där, kändes det som. Hade gärna besökt detta museum igen för att se de delar vi inte hann med nu.

title: Un museo maravilloso con detalles de cuidado
text: Fuimos en familia a visitar el museo.  Es claramente un museo de ciencias por lo que todo son mini experimentos y prácticas para observar y comprender fenómenos científicos.En ese sentido es fabuloso y nuestros hijos de 13 y 15 años de la pasaron probando cosas.Un único detalle, inesperado en un museo alemán, fueron algunos detalles de mantenimiento y limpieza requeridos tras el evidente maltrato de visitantes evidentemente inadaptados.

title: Verouderd
text: Het gelijkvloers en de eerste verdieping met boten, motoren en vliegtuigen waren goed. De rest van de verdiepingen hadden zeer verouderde tentoonstellingen. Veel knoppen werkten niet.

title: Das Deutsche Museum ist top, das Verkehrszentrum hat nicht gelohnt
text: Das Deutsche Museum auf der Museumsinsel ist interessant und mit tollen Exponaten ausgestattet, welche teilweise auch in Vorführungen näher gebracht werden.  Die Themen sind gut gegliedert. Es macht m.E. Sinn, wenn man sich vor dem Besuch gut über das Museum informiert und sich entsprechend seiner persönlichen Interessen vorbereitet. Man verliert dann beim Besuch keine wertvolle Zeit mit der Sucherei in dem riesigen Museum , obwohl die Ausschilderung recht gut ist.Das Verkehrszentrum des Deutschen Museums erscheint mir dagegen konzeptlos.So richtig gezielt wurde da keine Sammlung/Thema aufgebautt, von allem ein bisschen und das etwas durcheinander.Viele Exponate sind nicht gut zu besichtigen, so kann man z.B. bei den Straßenbahnen in den Fahrgastraum sehen, aber das eigentlich Interessante, wie Führerstand und Technik, ist nicht einsehbar.Auch viele der ausgestellten Autos sind innen ebenfalls schlecht bis nicht einsehbar.Einige Exponate waren abgesperrt und einige Vorführungen wurden an dem Besuchstag nicht  angeboten.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Interesante Museo de la Ciencia y Tecnología.
text: El Deutsches Museum es un interesante museo dedicado a la ciencia y tecnología. Desde mi punto de vista, algo extenso para poderlo ver todo bien en un día, porque consta de seis plantas con infinidad de barcos, aviones, submarinos...etc., es bastante completo y además es interactivo. Si te gusta el tema, aunque un poco cara la entrada, este es tu lugar.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Ridiculous Only ONE Toilet, It’s more like a mold museum
text: Compare to the German technology museum in Berlin, Deutsch Museum is over priced, it’s more like a mold museum, no much real stuff. There is only ONE TOILET hidden in the end of restaurant. WOW so precious. It took me a very LOOONG time to made it. I run all the way from the top 6 floor, and searched all the way.... one floor by one floor. There is another toilet on 3rd floor, but it was sealed because it was not working. Everything exhibited was so old...., and damaged. Frankly speaking, not much impressive. Last, the whole building was so HOT.

title: For technology lovers
text: It is a very nice museum with a lot and interesting displays. Among the others, it has a mining section, machinery, airplanes, a kids section etc. The gift shop has many items but in my opinion they are high priced. Another issue is that all the exhibits are explained in German and some of them in English. However, for technology and design advocates, it definately worths a visit.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Massive collection but very hot and airless
text: I visited on a Saturday afternoon and it was fairly busy. Weather had cooled down to 25 after having been up to 33 earlier in the week. I found virtually all areas very warm and some were uncomfortably hot and airless. Windows had been opened at  some locations but this didn't seem to help much. Galleries on upper floors were particularly bad. Had the inside temperature and ventilation been better I would have given a mark of 5. The number of exhibits (some very large) was very impressive and had the conditions inside been comfortable I would have stayed for much longer.Unlike the Verkehrsmuseum (at a separate location) there were very few English descriptions which didn't help. You could download an app which gives some English commentary but this was for very few items widely dotted around museum. Disappointed that the unpleasant conditions inside made me cut my visit short. I would like to have stayed for much longer. If you don't like hot stuffy museums I regretfully suggest you avoid this in hot weather.

title: Geçmişe yolculuk
text: Münih e gelmişken buraya uğramamazlık etmeyin derim. 6 kattan oluşan müzede kaybolabilirsiniz. İçerisinde ilk petrol çıkarmada kullanılan sistemlerden tutun, uçmak için gösterilen çabaların anlatıldığı ilk amatör uçaktan uzayla ilgili gelişmelerin yer aldığı çok kapsamlı bir müze. En az 2 saatinizi ayırmanız lazım.Giriş ücreti 5€ yine grup indirimleri yeralıyor.

title: Vielseitig & Eindrücklich
text: Das deutsche Museum bietet Einblicke in Technik, Physik, Entwicklungsgeschichte, etc. mit eindrücklichen Ausstellungsobjekten (Schiffe, Kleinflugzeuge).Zudem gibt es noch eindrückliche live-Präsentationen und Vorführungen.

title: Очень познавательный музей для детей и взрослых.
text: Меня очень впечатлили корабли (макеты) , "древние" компьютеры и математическая комната. Единственное - если Вы не владеете немецким языком ( а надписи на английском не на всех экспонатах), то придётся догадываться самим.

title: Bello ma con molte pecche
text: Il museo è grandioso e potrebbe essere da cinque stelle se non fosse che:- La maggior parte delle didascalie sono solo in tedesco (non pretendo in italiano, ma almeno l'inglese...)- Molte delle dimostrazioni interattive, in particolare nella sezione di fisica non funzionavano- La "guida gratuita" è un pieghevole con pochissime informazioni (la guida completa è a pagamento). Per un museo di sette piani qualche info in più sarebbe stata gradita- Chiude alle 17:00!

title: Certainly worth a visit!
text: Location: Take tram no. 17. It stops just across the museum. The museum has a lot to offer. It has 5 levels. Do look at the attached pictures to give you an idea of what you can see inside the museum. There were many tourists and students visiting the place when we were there. We paid Euro 28 for two adults. Students get a special price. I think it was Euro 4,50. Just double check in their website. Recommendation: Highly recommended!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Non lo consiglio
text: Il museo non dispone di parcheggio. È parecchio datato sia come edificio che come allestimento delle sale. Non è interattivo a parte la sezione di fisica. È mal disposto e la mappa fornita è davvero poco chiara. Poco organizzato. Personale non molto cortese. La maggior parte delle didascalie descrittive è solo in tedesco, poche anche in inglese. Non c'è ricambio d'aria né aria condizionata. Le esposizioni non sono un gran che. Sconsigliato.

title: The well had no water
text: Visited the museum with our teenagers. A great day out with lots to see and do. Learning was enhanced as slot of the floors encouraged interactive learning. The music section was off limits, this was disappointing as we have a keen interest in this area. However there was plenty to see at each level and plenty of seating for an occasional rest at each level. There were massage seats, €2 for 10 mins, well worth the money and a nice break. At the restaurant, we were refused a fill of tap water to our sports bottle. This is the first time we were refused a fill of tap water at any venue on our many travels across Europe to date.

title: Gigantisch tech museum
text: Dit museum kun je de hele dag voor nemen. We waren 3 uurtjes in het museum en we hebben nog niet eens de helft allemaal gezien. Hoogtepunt was de U-boot en alle teksten zijn ook in het engels.

title: 1 Stunde Warten
text: Teuer Teuer wie ganz München, was man bekommt haut einen nicht mehr vom Hocker. Essen bekommtst um 16.15 Uhr nichts mehr, stop Eis evtl. noch ein Kuchen. Und der Preis dafür wie immer Salzig.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Super cool
text: Honestly, it was kind of overwhelming. One day will not be sufficient if you plan of seeing just about everything they have to offer at this museum. If you want to just have a pleasant day trip, you’ll still see quite a lot of variety and for a very affordable price.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Zeit mitbringen
text: Das Museum ist einfach riesig und bietet genug um mehrere Tag darin zu verbringen. Wenn man nicht so viel Zeit hat am besten vorher eine Themenauswahl treffen.Kleiner Tipp: Wer die Tickets online kauft, spart sich das Anstehen an der Kasse.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Awesome Museum, wish we had more time there
text: Very good museum, really wish we had all day to spend there. Ticket booth is hidden, but beyond that the exhibits and interactive exhibits are great.  THEY HAVE AN ENTIRE WWI SUB inside! Awesome museum.

title: Manca qualche percorso da bambini e una guida in italiano
text: Il museo è bello, ci sono moltissime cose da vedere. Molto interessanti le dimostrazioni che vengono fatte (non semplici da trovare).Manca qualche percorso da bambini e una guida in italiano

title: Enttäuschend
text: Ich war enttäuscht. Außer das Planetarium, das fand ich gut. Vieles nicht mehr zeitgemäß, runtergekommen und einfach alt.

title: Great place to visit with so much to learn
text: We were definitely glad we visited the Deutsches Museum.  It would have been convenient to have audio guides or another translating device.  There was English sporadically which seemed to be on signage explaining the pieces.  It is a very large exhibition of a lot of history.  We allotted 2 hours which wasn't enough but we had a tour to catch.  It is good to grab the map of the building as it is confusing with the rear steps leading to a separate multi-level museum area.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Ein Muss
text: Wenn man in München ist, muss man das Deutsche Museum besuchen. Aber man muss viel Zeit einplanen, um alles zu sehen. Es ist einen besuch absolut wert. Kann es nur empfehlen.

title: Museo della tecnologia
text: Museo della tecnologia applicata con diverse sezioni e pezzi incredibili. E' enorme e quindi necessita tempo ed energia ma non delude. Il museo non ha didascalie o audioguida in italiano. Da ammodernare in diversi punti dove si avverte che l'allestimento è datato. Per i bambini diverse aree interattive.

title: Probably the best overall museum in Europe
text: I have been to the Deutsches Museum at least 10 times, as I have live in Munich on and off for the past 25 years!  My father-in-law actually worked there for his entire career and we always had access to the museum.  This is a fabulous place for kids and adults alike!  The Chicago Museum of Science and Industry was based on the Deutsches Museum concept, but this is the original!  Plan to spend the entire day and be exhausted at the end of the day!!

title: Prioritera din tid väl på detta omfattande museum!
text: Ett välsorterat museum med allt från gammal teknik till modern nanoteknik. För en humanist som jag själv, är de vackra panoramana den absolut bästa behållningen som inspirerar till skapande och vördnad för människan och det vi har gemensamt! En mycket omfattande utställning där du utan problem kan spendera mer än en dag. Så gör dina val väl för att inte få ont om tid. Appen med möjlighet till förköp av biljetter samt visst audioguide matrial som har engelska. Ett toppen museum som förtjänar högsta betyg om det inte vore för bristande skyltning på engelska, svårläst orientering mellan hallarna och totalt brist på ac och ventilation (vilket är förståeligt för ett äldre hus. ) Ta astronomi delen först då det är mycket att läsa och är märk och dåligt syresatt. Utställningen har också mycket interaktiva delar med knappar. Gruvutställningen var riktigt välgjord och nog särskilt spännande för barn! Teknikleksakernas avdelning var liten men ett trevligt besök. Fanns just nu även en kaffe-utställning! Gå dit!!! Det är värt värt det.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Zu empfehlen
text: Sehr große Museum, mit unterschiedlichen Richtungen. Ich war schon drei mal da und finde immer noch interessant da hin zu fahren. Planetarium ist zu empfehlen, kostet extra aber ich finde es lohnt sich. Hochspannungsanlage ist beeindruckend. Zu mal Zeit kann ich Bayrischer Hotdog empfehlen: Laugensemmel, Weißwurst mit süssem Senf und Meerrettich ist gute Kombination. Am Wochenende und Feiertagen viele Besucher und es loht sich früher kommen um lange Schlange zu vermeiden.

title: Manca di personalità
text: Il museo è molto grande ma è difficile orientarsi, nonostante mappa e tablet con App del museo. Molto curate le sale nautiche e energetiche, un po' meno le altre. Manca l'originalità di qualche pezzo unico. Obsoleta la struttura con problemi enormi di climatizzazione: tra saloni, stanze e scale possono esserci anche 7-8 gradi di differenza
